description: First component of quadruples a,b,c,d such that a < b < c < d, (a*b*c) mod (a+b+c) = d, (a*b*d) mod (a+b+d) = c, (a*c*d) mod (a+c+d) = b, (b*c*d) mod (b+c+d) = a. The quadruples are ordered according to sum of first three components, secondary by first component, thirdly by second component.
